body_html: Do you have any (small) snippet that would let us reproduce what you're seeing? I'm not sure if I fully understand the problem. nn.Embedding is fully deterministic and has no influence on the random state.

body: Do you have any (small) snippet that would let us reproduce what you're seeing? I'm not sure if I fully understand the problem. `nn.Embedding` is fully deterministic and has no influence on the random state.
